page.title: 01Introductory page
page.content: Our block is predominatly rural, lying in a part of the country called the mearns, a fertile area mostly given ove to crops and grass. There are 12 farms in the block. The only built up area in th block is Fordoun village which has about 90 houses. Redmyre Primary School is nearby. Fordoun has a fairly close connection with the nearest town, laurencekirk, which is 3 miles away. The nearest city is Aberdeen which is 25 miles away. The bigest recent development is the building of the dual carriageway by-passing Fordoun.
